name: PHContentEditingInput
desc: A container that provides information about and access to the image, video, or Live Photo content of an asset to be edited.

items.name: var mediaType: PHAssetMediaType
items.desc: The type of the asset, such as video or audio.

items.name: enum PHAssetMediaType
items.desc: Constants identifying the general type of an asset, such as image or video.

items.name: var mediaSubtypes: PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: The subtypes of the asset, identifying special kinds of assets such as a panoramic photo or a high-frame-rate video.

items.name: struct PHAssetMediaSubtype
items.desc: Constants identifying specific variations of asset media, such as panorama or screenshot photos and time lapse or high frame rate video.

items.name: var creationDate: Date?
items.desc: The date and time when the asset was originally created.

items.name: var location: CLLocation?
items.desc: The location information that was saved with the asset.

items.name: var uniformTypeIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The uniform type identifier for the asset’s image or video data.

items.name: var adjustmentData: PHAdjustmentData?
items.desc: An object that describes the most recent edit to the asset’s content.

items.name: var displaySizeImage: UIImage?
items.desc: An image of the asset’s contents, appropriately sized for display.

items.name: var fullSizeImageOrientation: Int32
items.desc: The Exif display orientation of the full-size image file.

items.name: var fullSizeImageURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL to a file that contains the full-sized image data.

items.name: var audiovisualAsset: AVAsset?
items.desc: The video asset, as an AVAsset object.

items.name: var avAsset: AVAsset?
items.desc: The video asset, as an AVAsset object.

items.name: var livePhoto: PHLivePhoto?
items.desc: The unedited Live Photo content of the editing input.

items.name: var playbackStyle: PHAsset.PlaybackStyle
items.desc: The style in which to present this content to the user.

items.name: enum PHAsset.PlaybackStyle
items.desc: An enumeration of asset playback styles that dictate how to present an asset to the user.
